name: Garden of Regrets
description:
This is a short turn based game about a person teaming up with her cat in a dream

Controls:
Click to go to the next level on the map and to select attacks on the battle mode
To skip the text parts, you can click in any part of the screen after waiting a bit

Attributions:
Kenney - Rock assets (retextured)
Supercyan - Trees
Haon - Witch character 
Ladymito - Cat character (retextured and added her hat)
John Leonard French - Music

Based on a course from Zenva

Hope you have fun! ^-^
